start.title: The Enchanted Forest
start.narr_text: You are a brave adventurer entering an enchanted forest. Legends speak of a hidden treasure guarded by mystical creatures. Your health is full, mana flows through you, and you have a few coins in your pouch. What will you do first?

1.text: Follow the glowing path into the woods (Perception check: d20 > 12)

2.text: Climb a tree to get a better view (Strength check: d20 > 8)

3.text: Cast a detection spell to sense magic (Mana cost: 10)

deep_forest.title: Deeper into the Woods
deep_forest.narr_text: The path leads you to a clearing with ancient runes on the ground. You sense great power here, but a riddle blocks your way: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?'

2.text: Try to bypass the runes physically

ambush.title: Goblin Ambush!
ambush.narr_text: You didn't notice the goblins hiding in the bushes. They leap out with daggers drawn! You must fight or flee.

tree_view.title: From the Treetops
tree_view.narr_text: From your vantage point, you spot a river leading to a waterfall. It looks promising. Descending carefully, you head that way.

1.text: Swim across the river (Swim check: d12 > 6)

fall.title: A Tumble Down
fall.narr_text: Your foot slips on a branch, and you fall awkwardly, bruising yourself. Ouch! You lose some health but manage to land safely.

magic_sense.title: Arcane Whispers
magic_sense.narr_text: Your spell reveals threads of magic weaving through the trees. One path pulses with danger, another with opportunity. You deduct 10 mana for the spell.

2.text: Investigate the dangerous one (Risky roll: d6 > 3)

mana_low.title: Mana Exhaustion
mana_low.narr_text: Your spell fizzles out due to low mana. You feel drained and decide to rest a bit.

treasure_found.title: The Treasure!
treasure_found.narr_text: The runes part, revealing a chest filled with gold and a magical amulet. You've completed your quest! Congratulations!

rune_trap.title: Rune Trap Activated
rune_trap.narr_text: The runes glow angrily, zapping you with arcane energy. You stagger back, weakened.

victory.title: Goblin Victory
victory.narr_text: With skillful strikes, you dispatch the goblins and loot their camp. A small victory!

defeat.title: Overpowered
defeat.narr_text: The goblins overwhelm you, leaving you battered and fleeing into the woods.

waterfall_cave.title: Behind the Waterfall
waterfall_cave.narr_text: You swim successfully and discover a hidden cave with glowing crystals. One seems particularly valuable.

drown_attempt.title: Struggling in the Current
drown_attempt.narr_text: The river's current pulls you under briefly. You cough up water but make it to shore, exhausted.

1.text: Catch your breath and try again

bridge_found.title: The Rickety Bridge
bridge_found.narr_text: You find an old bridge crossing the river. It looks unstable, but it's your way forward.

hidden_gem.title: A Hidden Gem
hidden_gem.narr_text: Amid the danger, you uncover a small gem pulsing with energy. It restores some of your mana!

crystal_success.title: Crystal Harvested
crystal_success.narr_text: You pocket the crystal, which hums with power. It might be worth a fortune!

crystal_shatter.title: Shattered Crystal
crystal_shatter.narr_text: Your hand slips, and the crystal shatters, releasing a burst of energy that singes you.

health_is_zero.title: Game Over
health_is_zero.narr_text: Your health has reached zero. The forest claims another victim. Better luck next time!

mana_is_zero.title: Mana Depleted
mana_is_zero.narr_text: Without mana, your spells fail, and you feel vulnerable. Rest or find a potion.
